title: Waring kingdoms evelynn....
body:
Hmm well Im trying to do this for the contest problem is Im not fluent in chinese. I dont want to get things wrong either. Im trying to find bad luck and good luck in simplified chinese for some objects in the scene.

Heres a small work in progress of a sketch so far 
https://i.gyazo.com/d26d2f71b9bf6b5b2920d46bf2c2971a.png

replies.body: Chinese isn't a language, I think you mean Mandarin.
